reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of NURS 302, NURS 303, NURS 304, NURS 305, NURS 306.
Co-reqs: Either (a) all of NURS 338, NURS 339, NURS 340 or (b) all of NURS 341, NURS 342, NURS 343. (Depends on sequencing of NURS 337 with other professional practice courses.)
Equivalents:
courseName: Professional Nursing Practice with Adults, Older Adults, and their Families
description: Analysis and application of theories, concepts, evidence, and competencies guiding professional nursing practice with older adults and their families in a variety of practice settings and contexts.
